title: Happy Dreamily Pizza
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Khmer, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An extensive menu with soups, salads, fried noodles, fried rice, curries, pumpkin tofu, ginger tofu, cashew nut tofu, tofu larb. Khmer and Thai dishes are generally non-dairy. Pick any dish and ask to use tofu. Vegans should specify no fish sauce. Small, basic tropical touristy atmosphere. Has Wi-Fi but sometimes doesn't work.
streetAddress: Riverside Rd, between Bokor Mountain Lodge and Oh! Neil
